tool.name: OTB.EdgeExtraction
tool.description: This application computes edge features on every pixel of the input image selected channel
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayin False output_data_out $output_data_out name OTB.EdgeExtraction in $in channel $channel ram $ram filter $filter filter_touzi_xradius $filter_touzi_xradius filter_touzi_yradius $filter_touzi_yradius out $out prefer $prefer response $response outputType_out $OutputSection_out.outputType_out transmissionMode_out $OutputSection_out.transmissionMode_out

param.name: in

param.name: out
param.label: Output image containing the edge features.
param.help: Output image containing the edge features.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.
